description: Fetch filter options for a resource.
permissions: Requires authentication; policy allows any user to create model filter infos.
side_effects: None; options are generated on demand and not persisted.
validation_notes: --resource-type is required and must map to a valid resource type; --scope-filters must be a valid JSON object; --scope-filter entries must be key=value with a non-empty key; scope_filters must be a hash and only include filters supported by the resource; filter keys are normalized to underscore.

flags.name: resource-type
flags.validation: Must be a valid resource type (maps to a resource class).

flags.name: filter-keys
flags.validation: Comma-separated list; values are normalized to underscore.

flags.name: filter-key
flags.validation: Repeatable; values are normalized to underscore.

flags.name: scope-filters
flags.validation: Must be a valid JSON object.

flags.name: scope-filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be key=value with a non-empty key.
